title: Tell Us How Your Family Uses Alexa
description: We want to hear about the creative or surprising ways your household uses digital assistants. Find Alexa creepy? Tell us about that, too.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Agrees to Testify Before House Committee
description: The FTX founder said on Twitter he would appear before a House committee next week, but was quiet about a similar request from a Senate committee.

title: Can ChatGPT Make This Podcast?
description: OpenAI’s new chatbot is a coder, a teacher, a potential Google killer, and … a friend?

title: Inside the Frantic Texts Exchanged by Crypto Executives as FTX Collapsed
description: A group chat including crypto leaders shows Binance’s Changpeng Zhao accusing FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried of orchestrating trades to destabilize the industry.
